mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (BOJ_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, ROLE, SEASON, BAEKJOON, VALID, CREATED_AT) VALUES ( #{bojId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{role}, #{season}, #{baekjoon}, '1', NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, BOJ_ID AS bojId, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, ROLE AS role, SEASON AS season, BAEKJOON AS baekjoon FROM USER WHERE BOJ_ID = #{bojId} AND VALID = VALID
